attributes.additional_details: We as a community need to feel safe in Swanscombe. Cars and bikes are being stolen/ burnt out daily! Pensioners are being beaten up at night and there money stolen. Houses and gardens being broken in to!  We dont go out at night for fear of our safety! We want our old safe Swanscombe village BACK! lets work together to get cctv in Swanscombe to help make it a safer place to live.

rejection.details: This is a local council issue
